title: Scholarships
description: Scholarship opportunities for bowlers in the Greater Fox Cities area.

hero.heading: Scholarship Program
hero.subheading: Investing in the future of bowling

sections.heading: Available Scholarships
sections.content: The Greater Fox Cities Bowling Association offers scholarships to support bowlers pursuing higher education.

sections.heading: Scholarship Forms
sections.content:
Download our scholarship application forms:

- [Greater Fox Cities BA Scholarship Form](https://www.greaterfoxcitiesba.com/wp-content/uploads/2026-GFCUSBC-Scholarship.pdf)
- [Wisconsin State Scholarship Form](https://www.greaterfoxcitiesba.com/wp-content/uploads/2026-WSUSBC-Scholarship.pdf)
